about.title: About the Association
about.paragraph_1: Al-Ta'alouf Association was established in 2005 with the aim of providing humanitarian services to various segments of society, with a special focus
about.paragraph_2: The association operates within a civilized environment through economic, social, developmental, medical, and educational projects on the most vulnerable and poorest..
about.paragraph_3: It is managed by a distinguished team of humanitarian workers.
about.paragraph_4: The association aims to provide humanitarian services to all groups of society without discrimination, with a particular focus on the most vulnerable and needy, to enhance resilience and empower local communities.
about.paragraph_5: It works in various sectors including health, education, livelihoods, shelter, protection, and other essential humanitarian fields.
about.paragraph_6: The association operates with an institutional framework that ensures the highest standards of governance, transparency, and professionalism in delivering services.
about.paragraph_7: It believes in partnerships and cooperation with local and international organizations to achieve sustainable development goals.
about.vision: A leading association in the field of humanitarian work, capable of delivering services with the highest quality for a sustainable and empowered society.

goals.g1: Contribute to all acts of charity and aid for the needy and poor residents in both rural and urban areas.
goals.g2: Support outstanding students, raise awareness about humanitarian support, and encourage charitable cooperation in all its forms.
goals.g3: Work on improving the situation of women (culturally, health-wise, socially, and economically), support youth in marriage and family building, and assist divorced and widowed women in finding work and securing a dignified life.
goals.g4: Implement economic, social, scientific, and health projects to enhance job opportunities in poor communities in rural and urban areas, after obtaining approval from the competent authorities.

about.mission: An association that provides a range of humanitarian services to all segments of society, especially the most vulnerable and poorest, to be an effective and sustainable force through economic, social, health, and educational development projects in urban and rural areas, within a civilized work environment that includes a distinguished team of humanitarian workers.

values.v5: Quality and excellence in task performance

card1.name: Mohammad Habbal
card1.content: One of the leading associations in Aleppo in humanitarian work across various sectors, distinguished by its institutional system and flexibility in responding to humanitarian crises. We had the honor of partnering in the health sector to implement a portfolio of projects in Aleppo since 2013 until now...

contact2.messageLine2: We strive to find solutions, don't hesitate to contact us...
